STATICFILES_STORAGE = 'commonstuff.storage.MinifyStaticFilesStorage'
Set this in your project settings.py if you want to minify JS and CSS files when you run collectstatic management command.
See: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.11/ref/contrib/staticfiles/#collectstatic

DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_MINIFY_CSS
Do we have to minify CSS while collectstatic (default True).

DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_MINIFY_JS
Do we have to minify JS while collectstatic (default True).

DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_CKEDITOR_MODELS
!!! IF THIS CONFIGURATION IS WRONG ckeditoruploads MANAGEMENT COMMAND WILL DELETE ALL YOUR CKEDITOR UPLOADS AS UNUSED !!!
Array of arrays: path to the model that uses ckeditor with file uploads and field name that ckeditor serves (default []).
For example: [ ['publication.models.Publication', 'body'], ['gurutest.apps.subscription.models.DigestTask', 'text'] ]

DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_CKEDITOR_MAX_IMAGE_SIZE
The size of the image in KB after which ckeditoruploads tries to reduce it by resizing (by default 512).

DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_CKEDITOR_MAX_IMAGE_W
If the px width of the image exceeds this setting (and filesize > DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_CKEDITOR_MAX_IMAGE_SIZE), resize image width to this maximum width keeping aspect ratio (default is 1000, px).

DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_CKEDITOR_MAX_IMAGE_H
If the px height of ckeditor uploaded image exceeds this setting (and filesize > DJANGO_COMMONSTUFF_CKEDITOR_MAX_IMAGE_SIZE), resize image height to this maximum height keeping aspect ratio (default is 1000, px).
